Description.Name: You Should See the Other Pilot!
Description.Details:
A knock sounds on your office door and you call out, "Come in..."

The door opens and Darius strides in, "Commander, I have good news, and bad news.  The good news is [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] passed their training and are now fully qualified to fly pretty much any LAM out there."

You smile, "That's great, now what's the bad news?"

Darius grimaces, "During the course of the flight tests, they suffered some injuries and will be out of action for some time.  We can speed up their recovery time if we allocate a medical team specificly to look after them."

Description.Name: Heal Naturally
Description.Details: [No MedTechs to spare]

Description.Name: Heal Naturally
Description.Details:
You look at Darius calmly, "Whilst I would love to spend the resources to try and expedite [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s recovery time, we just cannot afford to do so at this time.  They'll just have to accept the standard treatment the rest of the crew gets."

Darius nods, "Understood Commander.  I'll have them allocated a standard medical bed for recovery."

Description.Name: Assign MedTech
Description.Details: [MedBay 2 Available]

Description.Name: MedBay2
Description.Details:
You look at Darius, "What good is having an upgraded MedBay if we don't use the resources to try and expedite [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s recovery time?  Get them a dedicated MedTech to assist with their recovery."

Darius nods, "Understood Commander.  I'll have them allocated a MedTech in MedBay 2 for recovery."

Description.Name: Assign Medical Suite
Description.Details: [MedBay Hospital Available]

Description.Name: MedBay Hospital
Description.Details:
You look at Darius, "What good is having a fully functional Hospital if we don't use the resources to try and expedite [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s recovery time?  Get them into a private suite to assist with their recovery."

Darius nods, "Understood Commander.  I'll have them allocated a private suite in the Hospital for recovery."
